title: Font - "Hugo" poster
content:
Hi everybody,

Does anyone know the name of the three typefaces used on this french "Hugo" movie poster ?

Thank you for all the help you can provide !

Tristan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121114im_/http:/typophile.com/files/19846315_4290.jpg)

Font: 

 University Roman (Bold) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121114/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Tristan Isaac

comments.content: "Martin Scorsese..." & "HUGO CABRET" is a modified **[University Roman (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121114/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=University%20Roman%20Std%20-%20Bold&fid=ac3efc8ce0948473dd9a8d30e9be6619&fsize=60&text=Martin%20Scorsese%20HUGO%20CABRET&wrap=2)**
This is exactly the font I was looking for. Thank you very much.
